name: Cobrinha (Arthur Moreno Popien)
description:
Just a game I made using p5js, with some ideas and simple things that I don't intend on building up. The idea is  to just waste some time.

Instructions:

Game starts to count when you pick the first green square, and it stops/you lose when you move your mouse outside of the walls.

In the first button you can increase/diminish the size of the canvas where the snake is in.

In the second, you can inverse the colors, if you prefer a white background.

The third is just a rave mode because, why not?

To keep playing after loss, refresh the page.
